item.description:
Answer

ms

Next

ms

item.title: PLL2面判断
item.description:
全PLL、全方向、全配色の組み合わせです。

n1/U-perm

  • n1-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(r) = C(fr) and E(f) != C(rf) => { U(n1-{1, 4}) }

    E(f) = Invert(C(rf)) => { U(n1-1) }

  • n1-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:a:a) => { U }

    E(f) = Invert(C(rf)) => { U(n1-2) }

  • n1-3

    Form(F) = (a:a:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U }

    E(r) = Invert(C(rf)) => { U(n1-3) }

  • n1-4

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(r) = C(fr) and E(f) != C(rf) => { U(n1-{1, 4}) }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fr)) => { U(n1-4) }

n2/U-perm

  • n2-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(f) = C(rf) and E(r) != C(fr) => { U(n2-{1, 4}) }

    E(r) = Invert(C(rf)) => { U(n2-1) }

  • n2-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:a:a) => { U }

    E(f) = Invert(C(rf)) => { U(n2-2) }

  • n2-3

    Form(F) = (a:a:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U }

    E(r) == Invert(C(fr)) => { U(n2-3) }

  • n2-4

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(f) = C(rf) and E(r) != C(fr) => { U(n2-{1, 4}) }

    E(r) = Invert(C(fr)) => { U(n2-4) }

n3/A-perm

  • n3-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { A, R, G }

    E(r) = C(fr) and C(rf) = Next(C(rb)) => { A(n3-1) }

  • n3-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { A, T, V, R, G }

    E(f) != Invert(C(rf)) => { A, V, R, G }

    E(f) != C(rf) => { A(n3-2) }

  • n3-3

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { A, V }

    C(fl) = C(rb) => { A }

    C(fl) = Invert(E(f)) => { A(n3-3) }

  • n3-4

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { A, G }

    E(r) = Prev(E(f)) => { A }

    E(r) = C(fr) => { A(n3-4) }

n4/A-perm

  • n4-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { A, R, G }

    E(f) = C(rf) and C(fl) = Next(C(fr)) => { A(n4-1) }

  • n4-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { A, G }

    E(f) = Next(E(r)) => { A }

    E(f) = Prev(C(rf) => { A(n4-2) }

  • n4-3

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { A, V }

    C(fl) = C(rb) => { A }

    C(rb) = Invert(E(r)) => { A(n4-3) }

  • n4-4

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { A, T, V, R, G }

    E(r) != Invert(C(fr)) => { A, V, R, G }

    E(r) != C(rf) => { A(n4-4) }

n5/Z-perm

  • n5-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(r) = C(fr) and E(f) = C(rf) => { Z(n5-{1, 3}) }

  • n5-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(r) != C(fr) and E(f) != C(rf) => { Z(n5-{2, 4}) }

  • n5-3

    see n5-1

  • n5-4

    see n5-2

n6/H-perm

  • n6-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { U, Z, H }

    E(r) = Invert(C(fr)) and E(f) = Invert(C(rf)) => { H(n6-{1, 2, 3, 4}) }

  • n6-2

    see n6-1

  • n6-3

    see n6-1

  • n6-4

    see n6-1

n7/E-perm

  • n7-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { E, F, G, R, V, Y }

    E(f) = Next(E(r)) => { E, G }

    C(fl) = Next(C(rb)) => { E }

    E(r) = C(fr) => { E(n7-{1, 3}) }

  • n7-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { E, F, G, R, V, Y }

    E(f) = Next(E(r)) => { E, G }

    C(fl) = Next(C(rb)) => { E }

    E(f) = C(rf) => { E(n7-{2, 4}) }

  • n7-3

    see n7-1

  • n7-4

    see n7-2

n8/T-perm

  • n8-1

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { A, G, R, T, V }

    E(r) = Invert(C(fr)) => { T(n8-1) }

  • n8-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { A, G, R, T, V }

    E(f) = Invert(C(rf)) => { T(n8-2) }

  • n8-3

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:a) => { R, T }

    E(r) = Invert(C(rf)) => { T(n8-3) }

  • n8-4

    Form(F) = (a:b:a) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { R, T }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fr)) => { T(n8-4) }

n9/V-perm

  • n9-1

  • n9-2

  • n9-3

  • n9-4

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { A, V }

    C(fl) != C(rb) => { V(n9-4) }

n10/F-perm

  • n10-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { E, V, F, R, Y, G }

    ColorNum(F and R) = 3 => { F }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fl)) => { F(n10-1) }

  • n10-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { E, V, F, R, Y, G }

    ColorNum(F and R) = 3 => { F }

    E(r) = Invert(C(rb)) => { F(n10-2) }

  • n10-3

    Form(F) = (a:b:c) and Form(R) = (a:a:a) => { F(n10-3) }

  • n10-4

    Form(F) = (a:a:a) and Form(R) = (a:b:c) => { F(n10-4) }

n11/R-perm
n12/R-perm
n13/J-perm

  • n13-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { J, N }

    E(f) != Invert(C(fl)) => { J(n13-{1, 2}) }

    E(r) = Invert(C(rf)) => { J(n13-1) }

  • n13-2

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { J, N }

    E(r) != Invert(C(rf)) => { J(n13-{1, 2}) }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fl)) => { J(n13-2) }

  • n13-3

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:a) => { J(n13-3) }

  • n13-4

    Form(F) = (a:a:ab) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { J(n13-4) }

n14/J-perm

  • n14-1

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { J, N }

    E(f) != Invert(C(fr)) => { J(n14-{1, 2}) }

    E(r) = Invert(C(rb)) => { J(n14-1) }

  • n14-2

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { J, N }

    E(r) != Invert(C(rb)) => { J(n14-{1, 2}) }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fr)) => { J(n14-2) }

  • n14-3

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:a) => { J(n14-3) }

  • n14-4

    Form(F) = (a:a:a) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { J(n14-4) }

n15/Y-perm

  • n15-1

  • n15-2

    Form(F) = (a:a:b), Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { Y(n15-2) }

  • n15-3

  • n15-4

n16/G-perm
n17/G-perm
n18/G-perm
n19/G-perm
n20/N-perm

  • n20-1

    Form(F) = (a:a:b) and Form(R) = (a:a:b) => { J, N }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fr)) and E(r) = Invert(C(rb)) => { N(n20-{1, 2, 3, 4}) }

  • n20-2

    see n20-1

  • n20-3

    see n20-1

  • n20-4

    see n20-1

n21/N-perm

  • n21-1

    Form(F) = (a:b:b) and Form(R) = (a:b:b) => { J, N }

    E(f) = Invert(C(fl)) and E(r) = Invert(C(rf)) => { N(n21-{1, 2, 3, 4}) }

  • n21-2

    see n21-1

  • n21-3

    see n21-1

  • n21-4

    see n21-1

item.title: PLL手順
item.description:
n1/U-perm

L'UL'U'L'U'L'ULUL2

R'UR'U'R'U'R'URUR2

n2/U-perm

RU'RURURU'R'U'R2

LU'LULULU'L'U'L2

n3/A-perm

(r')RU'RD2R'URD2R2

n4/A-perm

R'2(r)U2R'D'RU'2(f')U'RU'

n5/Z-perm

UR'U'RU'RURU'R'URUR2U'R'U

n6/H-perm

M'2UM'2U2M'2UM'2

n7/E-perm

(r')RU'R'DRUR'D2L'ULUw(u')L'U'L

n8/T-perm

RUR'U'R'FR2U'R'U'RUR'F'

n9/V-perm

R'UR'U'(u)(r2)R'UR'U'R2(u)(r)R'U'RUR

n10/F-perm

U'R'URU'R'2F'(f)R'FRD(f')(r)UR'U'R2

n11/R-perm

R'U2RU'2R'FRUR'U'R'F'R2U'

n12/R-perm

F'R'U'RF'R'U(u')R'U'R'URBR2

n13/J-perm

RUR'F'RUR'U'R'FR2U'R'U'

n14/J-perm

R'U'RBR'U'RU(r')RU'R'2FRF

n15/Y-perm

(r')R'2FwR2U'RU(r')RU'(u)(r)R'UFU'R'

n16/G-perm

(r')(u')URU'(u)(r)R2Uw'RU'R'UR'UwR2

n17/G-perm

R2Uw'RU'RUR'UwR'2(u)RU'R'

n18/G-perm

Rw2U(r')(u)U'RU'R'URw'U2B'RB

n19/G-perm

R'U'(u)FR2UwR'URU'RUw'R'2

n20/N-perm

(f)U'RD'R2UR'DU'RD'R2UR'DR

(f)U'RD'R2UR'DU'RD'R2UR'DR'

n21/N-perm

LU'RU'2L'UR'LU'RU'2L'UR'U'

LU'RU'2L'UR'LU'RU'2L'UR'U
